reviews.text:
Don‚Äôt go. Terrible food. Ordered Messi burger and the cheeseburger and was so disappointed that I can‚Äôt believe a chain like Hard Rock cafe doesn‚Äôt do something about it. I see more complaints in the comments.
On top of everything, they added two espressos on the bill that we never ordered.‚ùå

*Burger bun- dry, probably a week old‚õîÔ∏è
*Burger patties- overcooked and tasteless(ordered medium, got well done)‚õîÔ∏è
*Chorizo sausage- they don‚Äôt even use ‚õîÔ∏èchorizo sausage but Njeguska kobasica. ‚õîÔ∏è
*French fries- was almost completely cold when it was served. ‚õîÔ∏è
*Cappuccino was good ‚úÖ
The waiter also doesn‚Äôt give a damn, as he approached me twice in the span of 30 minutes to ask ‚Äúhow was everything‚Äù, obviously forgetting that I already told him that we were not satisfied and told him everything that was wrong. They don‚Äôt care.

The food was very nice but if you compare the image of the burger in the menu with what I actually got then it‚Äôs quite different‚Ä¶ mine looks a yo-yo whereas in the menu the burgers fill the bun completely.
It was still nice and I would recommend the place, it‚Äôs just frustrating seeing what they‚Äôre selling you Vs what you actually get.

Legendary place, amazing atmosphere with good old Mtv channel playing best songs of 90s. Burgers are very nice but my patty was not very fresh, unsalty and little dry meat. Cocktails are great.

The service was mediocre: 10PM, empty place, but the waiter just passed by with menus at hand, paying no attention to us. I had to stand up and go grab the menus myself. He wasn't friendly and havent said a word when we thanked him for the dinner after paying for it.

Top-notch quality! The atmosphere in the place is just like in any Hard Rock Cafe, with many nice details and good music. The food is excellent, especially the burgers, and the prices are reasonable. The quality of the ingredients is superb! The only thing I miss is the Memphis burger like before, but everything else is outstanding. üòÑ
Location is good. The menu is well prepaired. Cocktails and burgers are above average. The atmosphere is definitely enjoyable.
